data.text: @antonioflobo Hello, Antonio. Thanks for writing to us. If there is anything we can help here, please let us know. Kind regards.
@dsultan Hello. We are very sorry for what you tell us. please send us a DM with all the details of your case. Kind regards.
@MikaelaParenti Hola Mikaela, if there is anything we can help you with, please send us a direct message. Kind regards.
@Jo_Loughlin Hola Jo, could you send us by MD more details and a screenshot of the error you mention, please? Kind regards.
@negra999 Hola Claudia, desconocemos los detalles de tu caso, ¿podrías enviarnos más información y tu número de caso por MD, por favor? Saludos.

data.text: @55eea Hola Laurie, unfortunately, we still haven't planned our summer 2023 routes. Please get back to us around April, in case you still need assistance. You can also keep an eye at https://t.co/Sm5YfHDq3L . We remain at your disposal
@rvbhagat Thanks, Rajesh
@rvbhagat Please check our new DM and provide the required information.
@rvbhagat We've just replied to your DMs. Regards

@rvbhagat Hola Rejesh, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your booking details, code, ticket number, registered email and phone contact number with international prefix to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@ParthCharan Hola PArth, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details about your case including your booking information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@gutrif1981 el país donde te encuentras, número de contacto incluyendo el código de área, número alternativo y un periodo de disponibilidad para atender la comunicación del área a cargo. quedamos atentos a tus mensajes por via privada. Saludos. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 /2

@gutrif1981 Hola Francisco, en este caso para poder solicitar la gestión deseada nos gustaria que nos acreditaras los siguientes datos de contacto por MD para poder asistirte: 
Tu nombre completo, código de reserva, divisa con la que se realizo la reserva, /1

@perlalessandra Hola Perla, nos gustaria que nos indicaras el error que te marca y el momento en el que ocurre, puedes acreditarnos todos los detalles asi como pantallazo por MD si lo deseas. Quedamos atentos a tu respuesta, un saludo. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Angel_of_Reason Hola Anne, we have responded your DM, regards.

data.text:
Today we celebrate with @AmericanAir @British_Airways and @traveloneworld that on December 1st we'll move to the new Terminal 8 at the JFK Airport in New York 🇪🇸✈️🇺🇸🗽

Read more 👉🏻https://t.co/qwSQtcxmhR https://t.co/ZnT5HlYgxI
RT @festelon: December is approaching and so is the start of FesTeLõn! Out of ideas for Christmas gifts? Why not give a little bit of FesTe…
@wmdavis1986 Hola Will, our check-in counter opens 3h before the flight's departure. Kind regards

@Laura18987295 Hola, salvo error no tenemos mensajes privados tuyos con los detalles de tu caso. Quedamos atentos a tu mensaje para verificar la información disponible desde este medio si así lo deseas. Quedamos pendientes. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@dariusxmoreno Hola Darius, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@urbanbirder You're very welcome. We're glad to read that our colleagues managed to assist your mother 😀
@BS45491137 Hola BS, the contact will be made through them, unfortunately we can´t give you any other information from here as our legal team is in charge of your case. Regards.
@bexpearce Hola Bex, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@Brendan_Bradley Hola Brendan, el uso de mascarilla en los transportes ha sido dictado por el Gobierno, no depende de la compañía, es obligatorio su uso en los vuelos desde y hacia España. Saludos
@CateM1965 Hola Catherine, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your PIR code and full passenger name to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@sarah___wood Hola Sarah, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details of your case including your booking code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@MailRkik Hola, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards
@thaisvoj Hola Thais, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your PIR code and  full passenger name to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@SzuritaOficial Hola Sebastian, nos gustaría tener más información sobre el incidente. ¿Iniciaste una reclamación en el aeropuerto?, ¿tienes un código PIR asociado?. Por favor déjanos saber todos los detalles por DM para revisar e indicarte cómo proceder. Saludos https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@dariusxmoreno Hola, we are sorry to read your comments, please let us know how we can help you from this department by sending us a DM https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 with all the information, regards.
@CElbachyr We've replied to your DMs. Unfortunately, the bag still hasn't been located. Please check our DM
@mar_mendez_ Hola Marina. Disculpa la demora, hemos dado respuesta a tu consulta por DM. Un saludo.
@smriti_2092 Hola Smriti, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and have just replied to your DMs. Please check
@CElbachyr Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name and PIR (property irregularity report) reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@ferstudiocl Hola Fer, sentimos leer tu comentario. Agradeceremos que puedas enviarnos un mensaje directo https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 con todos los detalles sobre lo sucedido y si hay algo en lo que podamos ayudarte desde aquí, déjanos saber. Saludos.
@Harrison_1919 Hola. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Sporthub365 Unfortunately, the upgrade bid option is only available for flights operated by Iberia. Kind regards
@mar_mendez_ Hola Marina. ¿Nos podrías brindar más detalles de tu consulta en un DM para poder revisar y asistirte? Quedamos atentos. Un saludo.

@Sporthub365 Hola Darren, if the option is not showing, is possible that is not available for the flight, wait until the check in or you can upgrade directly at the airport the day of your flight. Regards.
@Randallsolido Hola Randall, please send us the holder´s name and your PIR or report by DM. Thank you.
@Randallsolido Hola Randall, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@AnaRoma23894187 Hola Ana, ¿puedes darnos detalles de tu consulta por DM para poder ayudarte? Gracias y un saludo
@JamesLukeUSA No James, it is no necessary to call or pay , once the purchase is processed, you can update your personal information through the manage my booking website. Kind regards

@JamesLukeUSA Hola James, thank you for contacting us, you can let the birth date 01 as default, and process the purchase, and after the purchase you can enter to manage my booking website and update your personal information without problem. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@Dzoena Hola, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us all details by DM including your booking information, code, ticket number and registered email? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@pjury09 Hola Peter, please send us a direct message https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 with more details about your comments so we can help you. Kind regards.
@SarahJury8 Hola Sarah, could you send us more information, your booking code, ticket number and full name by DM, please? Kind regards.
@BuckeyeTap Hola, we have sent you a DM. Kind regards.
@christi89432823 Hola Christi, could you send us your case number, please? Regards.
@shrtdream If you have just made your booking we suggest you be aware within 24 hours of your purchase, we are attentive to your comments. Regards /2

data.text: @shrtdream Hola Mercedes, we inform you that when purchasing a booking and correctly processing the payment you should be able to receive a confirmation by email. /1

@MarcelaViz Hola Marcela, unfortunately we are unable to tell you anything different from what we have indicated you previously, if you want to select a different seat the payment must me done again. Kind regards.

@simonit Hola Simone, we're very sorry to read this. Were you able to issue a claim regarding your delayed bag? Please send us a DM with the details so we can assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@BS45491137 Hola, have you issued a claim regarding this incident? Please send us a DM with the details so we can have a look and assist you. Kind regards.

@erickro38338774 Hola, en mensajes previos te hemos solicitado información adicional para revisar tu caso y ayudarte desde este departamento. Te pedimos enviarnos un MD con todos los detalles. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 Saludos.
@herreramlourdes Hola Lourdes, te hemos solicitado información adicional a través de nuestra conversación privada. Quedamos pendientes.
@anathazanchick Hola Anat, please send us a DM with the details of your case so we can have a look and assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@Barrera_MBA We've requested you information in order to assist you Christian, please reply with that information so we can assist you. Best regards.
@Barrera_MBA Hola Christian, we have replied to your DMs requesting information, please check our message. Kind regards.

@Barrera_MBA Hola Christian, we're very sorry to read this, were you able to claim your bags at the airport? Please send us a DM with the details so we can assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@theCGAL Hola, were you able to claim this incident at the airport? Please send us a DM with the details so we can have a look and assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@BuckeyeTap Hola, we have requested an update from the corresponding department, we will inform you as soon as we have an answer. Best regards.
@cocojakob Hola Nicole. We're sorry to read this. Could you DM us with the details about your situation so that we're able to verify what happened with your luggage? Regards
@eeeeebcux We are sorry we are unable to indicate you something different from our end. Regards
@nickyalhe Hola Verónica, envíanos por MD (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) el trayecto y fecha que estás buscando para poder ayudarte. Quedamos a tu disposición, saludos.

@org_scp We've replied to the passenger's messages explaining how the mask exemption request should have been sent until 72h before the flight. We also indicated how he can submit a complaint, in case he wishes to have the case analyzed by our complaints department. Kind regards
@tleroy11 Hola Tommy, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your full name and the email address and booking code related to the voucher https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@marconi1878 Please check our DMs. We've sent you a message explaining how you can submit a formal complaint, so our colleagues are able to analyze it and get back to you by email within 7 business days.

@marconi1878 Sorry, Mark. As a spanish airline, we must follow the rules set by the spanish government. For further details, please contact the spanish embassy or consulate. In Spain the mask is mandatory on public transportation, which includes flights to/from Spain. Kind regards
@marconi1878 Hola Mark, masks are mandatory on all flights to/from Spain. For further information, please contact the spanish embassy or consulate. We've replied your DMs
@ALMORAJ Hola, sentimos leer tus comentarios. Por favor déjanos saber por MD si hay algo en lo que podamos ayudarte desde este departamento. Quedamos pendientes. Saludos. https://t.co/HyIAB652lE

data.text: @org_scp The mask exemption request must be submitted online until 72h before the flight. So, if the passenger never submitted the request, we are unable to give such authorization. To verify what happened, we really need the information required on our previous tweets.

@org_scp As a spanish carrier, we must follow the spanish government guidelines. In order to verify what happened, please send us a DM with the passenger's full name, booking code and ticket number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@HereisAlexander Hola, desconocemos los detalles de tu caso. Por favor déjanos saber por MD si hay algo en lo que podamos ayudarte desde este departamento para revisar e indicarte cómo proceder. Saludos. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@BeardyClam information, please contact the spanish embassy or consulate. Regards

@BeardyClam Hola, according to the spanish government, the mask use is still mandatory on public transportations, which includes flights to/from Spain. As we follow their guidelines, the mask use is mandatory in our flights. For further/1

@org_scp Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Mask exemption requests must be submitted until 72h before the flight. Please send us a DM with your full name, booking code and ticket number (075...) https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@megias71 Hola Asun, gracias por contactarnos. Por favor envíanos un MD con tu código de reserva, nombre completo y número de billete para revisar y ayudarte desde este departamento. Quedamos pendientes. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

urls.title: Avgeek Alert: Deciphering Airport Runway Markings - Me gusta volar
urls.description: As with roads for cars, trucks, and motorcycles, airport runways have their own special markings, some obvious, some not - so here's a little primer!

data.text: We end with an easy one: a discontinuous line that identifies the central axis to provide alignment guidance for the aircraft. 🤔 Discover the nine types of runway markings and how aircraft move on the ground. ✈️ (4/4) https://t.co/9FIymMkOO7

Now one with numbers! It indicates the first two digits of the degrees of orientation of the runway with respect to the magnetic north: 25. If there are parallel runways, the letter R refers to the right and the letter L to the left. We're referring to: (3/4)
If they indicate the start of the runway where the pilot can land and look like a zebra crossing, we're talking about: 👀 (2/4)

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

data.text: You probably already know this but... 🤔 Just like roads, airports have markings and signs to organise the traffic. ✈️ The ones you see painted on the runway are known as horizontal signs or runway markings. How many types can you guess? ⬇️ (1/4) https://t.co/VoBG6nkMlH

@elisamartin1999 Hola Elisa, all flight cost will deped of the demand and date, we suggest you to delete your cache and cookies and also try through the incognito mode. Any question give us a DM with more details. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@verushka1980 Te ofrecemos una disculpa por esta incidencia. Esperamos que puedas abordar cuanto antes. Desde aquí, estamos a tu disposición. Saludos.
